title: Here is the Gold Coast

description: In west Africa strenuous efforts are being made to improve the land and make it more productive in every way. Three million pounds will be spent by the British government in the Gold Coast area in the next ten years in an attempt to bring irrigation, scientific farming, hygiene and education to the colony.
